          </a>
        </li>

        <li class="c-header__main-nav-item header-sp-mobile-link-container" id="header-sp-mobile-link-container">
          <a data-name="SpecialPromoLink" class="c-header__bottom-link" href="//www.cian.ru/cat.php?deal_type=sale&amp;engine_version=2&amp;builder=9&amp;offer_type=flat&amp;with_newobject=1&amp;object_type%5B0%5D=2&amp;location%5B0%5D=1&amp;location%5B1%5D=4593&amp;from_developer=1&amp;is_pik_promo=1" data-reactroot=""><span data-name="getMobileLinkContent">Новостройки <span class="c-header__bottom-link__text">от ПИК <span data-name="LinkImage" class="c-header__bottom-link-pik-icon"></span></span></span></a>
        </li>
      </ul>

      <span id="c-header__mobile-logout">
      </span>
      <div class="c-header__main-nav-divider"></div>

    </div>
  </div>
